sen.j: 県犬養広刀自（あがたのいぬかいひろとじ、生年不詳 - 762年11月8日（天平宝字6年10月14日 (旧暦)））は聖武天皇の夫人。
sen.e: Agata no Inukai no Hirotoji (year of birth unknown - November 8, 762) was a Bunin (consort of the emperor) of Emperor Shomu.
Agata no Inukai no Hirotoji (year of birth unknown - November 8, 762) was the wife of Emperor Shomu.
sen.cmt: the wifeの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: Agata no Inukai no Hirotoji (year of birth unknown - November 8, 762) was the wife of Emperor Shomu.

sen.j: 正三位。
sen.e: She was ranked as Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).
She was ranked as Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).
She was ranked as Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank).

tit.cmt: 下記の内容からすると、Backgroundが適切だと思います。

sen.j: 県犬養連宿禰出自の一人。
sen.e: She was one originated from Agata no Inukai no Muraji Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles).
sen.cmt: 「県犬養連宿禰」の読みは、下記サイトから引用しました。http://kazeoto.com/tatibana.html
sen.e: She originated from Agata no Inukai no Muraji Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles).
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所を削除しました。
sen.e: She originated from Agata no Inukai no Muraji Sukune (third highest of the eight hereditary titles).

sen.j: 父は県犬養唐。
sen.e: Her father was Agata no Inukai no Morokoshi.
sen.cmt: 「県犬養唐」の読みは、下記サイトから引用しました。http://kotobank.jp/word/%E7%9C%8C%E7%8A%AC%E9%A4%8A%E5%BA%83%E5%88%80%E8%87%AA
sen.e: Her father was Agata no Inukai no Morokoshi.
Her father was Agata no Inukai no Morokoshi.

sen.j: 母不明。
sen.e: Her mother was unknown.
Her mother was unknown.
Her mother was unknown.

sen.j: 同氏出身者に藤原不比等妻、県犬養三千代がいる。
sen.e: Among the members of the family, there was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo who was a wife of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.
Among the members of the family, there was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo, the wife of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所を削除しました。
sen.e: Among the members of the family, there was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo, the wife of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.

sen.j: 広刀自は聖武天皇の夫人であり、聖武天皇との間に、安積親王、井上内親王、不破内親王の一男二女をもうけた。
sen.e: Hirotoji, a Bunin of Emperor Shomu, had one son and two daughters by him, i.e. Prince Asaka, Princess Inoe and Princess Fuwa.
Hirotoji, the wife of Emperor Shomu, had one son and two daughters: Prince Asaka, Princess Inoe and Princess Fuwa.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、全体を修正しました。
sen.e: Hirotoji, the wife of Emperor Shomu, had one son and two daughters: Prince Asaka, Princess Inoe and Princess Fuwa.

sen.j: 聖武天皇には他に妻として、光明皇后がおり、皇后との間には基王、阿倍内親王（のちに即位して孝謙天皇）が生まれている。
sen.e: Emperor Shomu had Empress Komyo as another wife, by whom he had Prince Motoi and Princess Abe (Later, ascended the throne as Empress Koken).
Emperor Shomu had Empress Komyo as second wife with whom they had Prince Motoi and Princess Abe (later, ascended to the throne as Empress Koken).
sen.cmt: 前置詞等を修正、追加しました。
sen.e: Emperor Shomu had Empress Komyo as second wife with whom they had Prince Motoi and Princess Abe (later, ascended to the throne as Empress Koken).

sen.j: 基親王が生後1年持たずして夭折していることから、聖武天皇の有望な男児を唯一もうけた人物といっても過言ではない。
sen.e: In view of the fact that Prince Motoi died young without waiting to become one year old, it is not too much to say that Hirotoji was only person who gave birth to a hopeful son of Emperor Shomu.
Since Prince Motoi died within a year after his birth, Hirotoji was the only person to give birth to a hopeful son of Emperor Shomu.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、全体を修正しました。
sen.e: Since Prince Motoi died within a year after his birth, Hirotoji was the only person to give birth to a hopeful son of Emperor Shomu.

sen.j: 広刀自が聖武天皇の妃となった時期は詳しくはわからないが、『続日本紀』によれば、安積親王が天平十六年（744）に17歳であった。
sen.e: It is not certain when Hirotoji became a Bunin of Emperor Shomu, but according to "Shoku Nihongi" (Chronicle of Japan Continued), Prince Asaka was 17 years old in 744.
It is not certain when Hirotoji became a wife of Emperor Shomu, but according to the "Shoku Nihongi" (Chronicle of Japan Continued), Prince Asaka was 17 years old in 744.
sen.cmt: wifeの方が良いを思います。定冠詞が一部抜けています。
sen.e: It is not certain when Hirotoji became a wife of Emperor Shomu, but according to the "Shoku Nihongi" (Chronicle of Japan Continued), Prince Asaka was 17 years old in 744.

sen.j: このことから、少なくとも神亀五年（728）年には聖武天皇の妻になっていたことがわかっている。
sen.e: From the above, it is known that she became a wife of Emperor Shomu as early as 728.
From the above, it is known that she became a wife of Emperor Shomu as early as 728.
From the above, it is known that she became a wife of Emperor Shomu as early as 728.

sen.j: 一説には、光明皇后よりも先に妻になっていたとも言われている。
sen.e: According to one theory, she became a wife of Emperor Shomu earlier than Empress Komyo did.
According to one theory, she became a wife of Emperor Shomu earlier than Empress Komyo did.
According to one theory, she became a wife of Emperor Shomu earlier than Empress Komyo did.

tit.cmt: rolesの方が良いと思います。

sen.j: 広刀自が聖武天皇の妻となった背景には、前出の三千代の存在が大いにある。
sen.e: The background of Hirotoji's marriage with Emperor Shomu closely related to the existence of the above Michiyo.
The background of Hirotoji's marriage with Emperor Shomu closely related to the existence of the Michiyo.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所を削除しました。
sen.e: The background of Hirotoji's marriage with Emperor Shomu closely related to the existence of the Michiyo.

sen.j: というより、不比等・三千代夫妻の推挙によって夫人となったと考えて差し支えないであろう。
sen.e: Rather, it would be alright to understand that she became a Bunin under the recommendation of Fuhito and Michiyo.
Perhaps, it can be understood that she became a wife under the recommendation of Fuhito and Michiyo.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため一部を修正しました。
sen.e: Perhaps, it can be understood that she became a wife under the recommendation of Fuhito and Michiyo.

sen.j: 広刀自の娘、井上内親王が斎王に選ばれ、光明皇后の息子の基親王が、産まれてまもなく皇太子となっている。
sen.e: Princess Inoe, a daughter of Hirotoji was selected as Saio (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) and Prince Motoi, a son of Empress Komyo was installed as Crown Prince soon after his birth.

Princess Inoe, the daughter of Hirotoji was selected as Saio (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) and Prince Motoi, the son of Empress Komyo, was installed as the Crown Prince soon after his birth.
sen.cmt: 冠詞を修正しました。定冠詞、カンマを追加しました。
sen.e: Princess Inoe, the daughter of Hirotoji was selected as Saio (Imperial Princess appointed to serve the deities of the Kamo-jinja Shrines) and Prince Motoi, the son of Empress Komyo, was installed as the Crown Prince soon after his birth.

sen.j: このことから、最初から広刀自には内親王を産むことが期待され、光明皇后（光明皇后の母は県犬養三千代）には親王の出産が期待され、それぞれ斎王と天皇とになっていくことが目論まれていた可能性がある。
sen.e: Due to the above, it was possibly planned from the beginning that Hirotoji would give birth to a Princess and Empress Komyo (Mother of Empress Komyo was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo) to a Prince and the children would became Saio and Emperor respectively.

Because of that, it was possibly planned from the beginning that Hirotoji was expected to have a Princess and Empress Komyo (Mother of Empress Komyo was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo) was expected to have a Prince so that their children could become the Saio and the Emperor.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため一部を修正しました。
sen.e: Because of that, it was possibly planned from the beginning that Hirotoji was expected to have a Princess and Empress Komyo (Mother of Empress Komyo was Agata no INUKAI no Michiyo) was expected to have a Prince so that their children could become the Saio and the Emperor.

sen.j: さらに、広刀自の娘である井上内親王、井上内親王と光仁天皇との間に産まれた娘である酒人内親王、そして、酒人内親王と桓武天皇との間に生まれた娘である朝原内親王の3代にわたって斎王に選ばれている。
sen.e: Furthermore, Princess Inoe, a daughter of Hirotoji, Princess Sakahito, a daughter of Princess Inoe and Emperor Konin and Princess Asahara, a daughter of Princess Sakahito and Emperor Kanmu were selected as Saio for three generations.

Furthermore, Princess Inoe (the daughter of Hirotoji), Princess Sakahito (the daughter of Princess Inoe and Emperor Konin) and Princess Asahara (the daughter of Princess Sakahito and Emperor Kanmu) were selected as Saio for three generations.
sen.cmt: カンマを使用しすぎると読みづらいため、括弧を使用しました。冠詞を修正しました。
sen.e: Furthermore, Princess Inoe (the daughter of Hirotoji), Princess Sakahito (the daughter of Princess Inoe and Emperor Konin) and Princess Asahara (the daughter of Princess Sakahito and Emperor Kanmu) were selected as Saio for three generations.

sen.j: このことから、広刀自ないしは県犬養氏には、言わば、「斎王腹」としての役割が期待されていたのではないか、とする説がある。
sen.e: In view of the above, there is a theory that Hirotoji or Agata no Inukai family was expected to play a role of so-called 'Womb of Saio.'
In view of the above, there was a theory that Hirotoji or Agata no Inukai family was expected to play a role in the so-called 'Womb of Saio.'
sen.cmt: 時制が違います。前置詞を修正しました。
sen.e: In view of the above, there was a theory that Hirotoji or Agata no Inukai family was expected to play a role in the so-called 'Womb of Saio.'

sen.j: しかし、前述のとおり、聖武天皇と光明皇后との間に産まれた基親王は早くに亡くなり、安積親王の存在がクローズアップされるようになってしまう。
sen.e: As above-mentioned, however, Prince Motoi, a child of Emperor Shomu and Empress Komyo died earlier, which made the existence of Prince Asaka highlighted.
As already mentioned, Prince Motoi (the child of Emperor Shomu and Empress Komyo) died at an early age, so Prince Asaka was expected to be the Crown Prince.
sen.cmt: 読みやすくするため、括弧を使用しました。文の流れを自然にするために、一部修正しました。
sen.e: As already mentioned, Prince Motoi (the child of Emperor Shomu and Empress Komyo) died at an early age, so Prince Asaka was expected to be the Crown Prince.

sen.j: 藤原氏は対抗措置として、前例のない内親王の立太子を実現させることになる。
sen.e: It ended up with the Fujiwara clan making it realized, as a countermeasure, that a Princess be unprecedentedly installed as Crown Prince.
To prevent that, the Fujiwara clan installed a Crown Princess for the first time.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため全体を修正しました。
sen.e: To prevent that, the Fujiwara clan installed a Crown Princess for the first time.

sen.j: そんな中で、安積親王自身も若くして亡くなってしまう（藤原仲麻呂による毒殺との説もある）。
sen.e: During that time, Prince Asaka himself died young (There is a theory that he was killed with poison by FUJIWARA no Nakamaro).
During that time, Prince Asaka also died at an early age (There is a theory that he was killed with poison by FUJIWARA no Nakamaro).
sen.cmt: 統一用語に従いat an early ageを使用しました。不要な箇所を削除、修正しました。
sen.e: During that time, Prince Asaka also died at an early age (There is a theory that he was killed with poison by FUJIWARA no Nakamaro).

sen.j: そして、広刀自は、安積が没してから十八年後の天平宝字六年（762）10月に亡くなる。
sen.e: And then, Hirotoji died in October 762, 18 years after Asaka died.
sen.cmt: 「天平宝字六年10月」＝グレゴリオ暦「西暦762年10月26日」、出典：http://maechan.net/kanreki
sen.e: Then, Hirotoji died in October 762, 18 years after Prince Asaka died.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所は削除しました。Princeは記載した方が良いと思います。
sen.e: Then, Hirotoji died in October 762, 18 years after Prince Asaka died.

sen.j: このとき正三位。
sen.e: She was ranked Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) at that time.
She was ranked as Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) at that time.
She was ranked as Shosanmi (Senior Third Rank) at that time.

sen.j: 広刀自所生の子女はいずれも悲劇的な運命をたどったが、とりわけ長女井上内親王が一時は光仁天皇の皇后となりながらも、廃后の末に不自然な死を遂げるの。
sen.e: The children Hirotoji gave birth to all had a tragic fate, more especially, the eldest daughter, Princess Inoe once became the Empress of the Emperor Konin, but was deprived of her title of Empress and came to a mysterious end.

The children that Hirotoji gave birth to all had tragic fates, especially the eldest daughter, Princess Inoe who became the Empress of the Emperor Konin, but was deprived of her title later and died from mysterious causes.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため一部を修正しました。
sen.e: The children that Hirotoji gave birth to all had tragic fates, especially the eldest daughter, Princess Inoe who became the Empress of the Emperor Konin, but was deprived of her title later and died from mysterious causes.

sen.j: それを見ずに終わったのはせめてもの幸いだったろう。
sen.e: However, at least Hirotoji had the blessing that she did not know the above and died.
Fortunately, Hirotoji did not have to face that.
